0010001010010101 1110001100010010 1 -> sum: 0000010110101000, cout: 1

0001110010100010 0110011001101101 0 -> sum: 1000001100001111, cout: 0
1111011111011000 1010101101011011 1 -> sum: 1010001100110100, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
